data.eml:eml: Studies in Corinnidae (Araneae): a new Paratrachelas Kovblyuk & Nadolny from Algeria, as well as the description of a new genus of Old World Trachelinae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bosselaers, Jan, Bosmans, Robert (2010): Studies in Corinnidae (Araneae): a new Paratrachelas Kovblyuk & Nadolny from Algeria, as well as the description of a new genus of Old World Trachelinae. Zootaxa 2612: 41-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197827
